title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 28 - Alternative Method Of Dispute Resolution By Arbitration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 28 - Alternative Method Of Dispute Resolution By Arbitration

State Regulations
§ 28.0 - Repealed
§ 28.1 - Definitions
§ 28.2 - Mandatory submission of actions to arbitration
§ 28.3 - Arbitration commissioner
§ 28.4 - Selection of panels of arbitrators
§ 28.5 - Assignment of actions to panel
§ 28.6 - Scheduling of arbitration hearings
§ 28.7 - Defaults
§ 28.8 - Conduct of hearings
§ 28.9 - Costs of hearings; stenographic record
§ 28.10 - Compensation of arbitrators
§ 28.11 - Award
§ 28.12 - Trial de novo
§ 28.13 - Motion to vacate award
§ 28.14 - General power of court
§ 28.15 - Training courses
§ 28.16 - Judicial hearing officers and court attorney referees

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 28

Statutory authority: Constitution, art. VI, § 28[c]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
